content:
I understand, that's why I asked to specialists for help.
Btw, is it better to discuss technical things here or using community/developers google groups for this kind of things ?
That totally depends on your favorite style of communication. I for one prefer chatting. And it feels more like a conversation here than on the mailing list.
Ok thks Oliver, I prefer chatting too.
And probably the tech-savvy people are hanging out here... :wink:
Yeah, I've always like chat, including talk on VAX/VMS back in the day. The rest of the world has finally caught up. :big_smile:
